Bot & Dolly - SF (Potrero Hill) - FULLTIME

We are working to advance robotics and automation as a creative medium and build world-class tools that enable others to do the same. As part of Google's new robotics initiative (http://nyti.ms/19ghryl), we're working with some of the best engineers and designers on the planet to build the future of automation.

Our open positions are described on our website (http://botndolly.com/jobs). We're looking particularly for people with experience building modern 3D applications and UIs, as well as strong C++ generalists.
